Review:
I loved it especially during covid. They did an amazing job in protecting people from spreading the virus. It's not so easy to do such arrangements within span of time. 

I was absolutely safe during my journey and until I reach my destination. But every individual has responsibilities to keep themselves safe. So I did my best and they did their best. 

Anyone wants to travel now? Bangalore airport is the best option. 

Just leave to your places
Good I liked it but I came this time in Covid 19 The airport ✈ is full empty empty Last time when I visited it was full

As it is a international airport it's very huge in size and very beautiful decorated and designed. All the thinking are well maintained and they have a lot of food stalls different brand stores from which you can shop.

Very bigg airport. It's neat, it's clean and one of the best international airports in India. The staff is polite and helpful. They offer remote assistance through video calls at kiosks which are conveniently located at regular information (Maybe because of Covid pandemic). The lounge is good too. Many options for shopping for gentlemen, ladies and kids.
Has changed alot,everyone has to wear a mask.......social distancing is there and everything..it is much safer now.

As it's a international airport, everything has maintained carefully as per international standards, very beautiful and well sanitized maintained by airport authorities during Covid-19. Location is very good out of City area, peripheral area well maintained with vertical gardening flowers. As usual it's very good place 👌👍. Natural solar energy has been used for area lighting, good restaurants, shopping show room are available in waiting areas.
@Blr lounges, Fantastic foods and professional staffs. Great and safe service in this pandemic situation . Thanks to every staffs.

Very near and clean. Systematic screening because of pandemic situation. Helpful staff, overall experience was very good. 

The place is huge so it took some time.for me to search the correct counters but that's the only negative thing I can say about airport. 

Rest was amazing.
Things are well organized to handle the covid situation especially when there's a mad rush of international passengers. Kudos to the team

My first flight sonce Covid and must say the management has done well to avoid as much contact as possible.

The roads towards the airport has also been improved.
As always one of the best, but this pandemic everything has changed a hustling bustlingairport has come to almost complete haul... May Almighty bring old days back to us..
Its awesome!! Big airport fulfilling with good facilities.

I am giving 4 stars only during covid because the health screening procedure was very poorly managed. Definitely this will improve
 It took over 3hrs for us to get out of the airport since arrival. Quite easily this can be well managed. There are no toilets before health screening, this has to be taken care off when people are waiting for such a long time.  Hope so this will improve with experience. Thanks to the staff anyways for keeping up with the crowd patiently.
Great service. All social distancing protocols maintained and extremely hygienic.

This is the best airport in India. Everything is neat and clean. After covid, it has become no human touch airport. You will come, take boarding passes on your own from vending machines and even bag tags. Even foods at KFC and other stalls also you can order through screens installed next to the shops. This is an international airport but it is located at a very long distance from the bangalore city. So it will take 45 to 60 minutes to reach the main city from here by a cab.
Truly amazed by the hospitality gave by the lounge in this covid-19 circumstance.
I was really happy to see the airport environment after COVID pandemic. From entry to exit its was guided and maintained well. I believe individual person also follow the set rules.

Staffs are good  airport are neat and clean but far away from city Airport buses must stop in one district center at night time  so that female travelers may board the flight easily and without any fear
Well maintained and nice ambience... But very far from Main city.. No mode of transportation available for going nearby district

It covers nearly 35 km from Bangalore to Airport. From the entrance to the terminal, in the Airport Road the flowers are planted on centre of the road and also in both sides. It looks like a garden and the fragrance from the flowers gives a fresh natural air. More garden facilities are under construction 17/08/2020.
l travelled during Covid-19 pandemic albeit the airport are maintain the social distancing.The thermal scanner are used to check the passengers. The airport also clean and fresh.
It's always nice to visit this airport. However, construction is going on these days due to which some areas are closed.

One of the most tech-advanced airports in India. 
After undergoing an intense renovation, BLR airport boasts a very modern outdoor hub called the QUAD which has a collection of shops, dine-in restaurants and local handicraft stores. The best part is, you don't even have to fly somewhere to experience the amenities. As for the airport itself, it's undergoing an expansion to move into  a 2 parallel runway system and a also brand new terminal.

Now there is a new process called as web check in. And we need to get the temperature check 3 to 4 times. There will be no food available in the flights or nearby airport. Wearing masks inside the domestic flights is not that mandatory. No social distancing is followed.
Nice arrangements done by the authorities considering COVID 19 situation.

It was very neat and clean with all facilities
Services were good
Now a days many things automated it's nice experience

I have been to and transited through many international airports. Have to say that Bangalore international Airport is one of the better managed and operated airports.  From immigration ans security staff all the way to check-in and handlers everyone is courteous and diligent.
Well maintained, place for domestic and international travel, even during COVID-19 the government advisories are strictly enforced and followed!
Cleanliness is truth, management of queue is good. Never faced an issue. Security could be improved once the entry is made into the airport premises, specially in COViD situation
It's currently under renovation for the new terminal addition. Trouble with two wheeler parking. Otherwise it's well maintained.
Awesome place, the services are good. Food court is expensive only things that's affordable and filling are subway ( which is outside) and kfc (which is after security check)

This Is an International as well as Domestic Airport in INDIA which is Busy all the Time even in Pendemic situations. All the measure's are taken to sanitize it. Well Maintained and had best Facilities for all kind of Passengers... Well equipped with Food Couts and Layover Area...
It has been an Amazing experience and It has One Terminal... Other one is in Construction.
Banglore airport is like a palace for the people , the facilities the infrastructure every thing is very perfect
Considering covid 19 situation, airport is fully prepared. Almost all contact less desk and procedure. You can have PPE kit by your own as well.

Airport is well maintained, cleaned and disinfected thoroughly. Quite big and busy but well organized and ordered. You'd want to reach atleast 2 hours before your flight time to avoid last time rush. Has only one Terminal for both domestic and international flights. Adequate stores for meals but overpriced.

Everthing was good specially during this covid-19 times..
Clicked the photos while returning back to Banglore. The river in that is 'THE GANGA'

It is international airport it's infrastructure is very impressive. During Covid-19 pandemic it is necessary to have epass of seva sindhu for travel to Karnataka.
All flights are available here , one thing is that , it is far away from bengaluru city , approx 65km , you can use bus service at airport for majestic bus stand  and also many routes of bus service there. No any problem with bus services.
One for the present & the future....I can say easily this is the best airport in South India...Passenger handling,  Connectivity, Destinations, Expansion all happening here....
Neat clean and luxurious. Safe for handicapped. And also for common man.
So good hospitality.  Immigration officers were so polite and good.  Overall enjoyed the timely guidance.  Thank you all..
It's beautiful and very well maintained.
Seems to be well organised during these tough times, Focus on social distancing is optimal
One of the most welcoming airports... Plenty of eateries and sitting area.. Helpful staff and clear announcements.
Definitely good ,,,,in terms of facility I wanted to give 4.5 star but people who run the airport  are amazing here 😊😊
If your pockets are full, this is one of best airport of India and even becoming better day by day in almost every aspect you name. But for the lower middle class they need to look around.
One of neat , Green and clean airport I have seen in india!!

No Quarantine
NO screening..
NO printed boarding pass needed, phone is enough
In 5 minutes you Wil be at ur gates...
The best airports visited till date ! I hope all India roads become the way this has ..

I love this airport. Most neat and clean well maintained well managed and most technologically advanced. Having best house keeping and ground staff. The Quad area is the most welcoming and entertainment area.
